events.message: I just received the smartphone I ordered last week, but the screen has multiple scratches and it looks faulty.
The issue was identified as a product defect based on the customer's description of scratches and faults on the smartphone screen.
The case has been assigned to a product support specialist for further handling of the defective smartphone issue.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I'm sorry to hear your smartphone screen arrived scratched and faulty. I'll assist you with this.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the serial number from the device so we can verify the issue and expedite the process?
I have attached clear pictures of the scratches on the screen and included the serial number as requested. Please review them.
Thank you for the photos. We will arrange a replacement unit to be shipped to you within 3 business days and provide a prepaid label for returning the faulty phone.
That sounds good, I appreciate the quick replacement offer and the prepaid return label for the defective device.
We have processed your replacement order and sent the return label via email. Your case for the defective smartphone screen is now resolved.
We are following up to ensure that you have received the replacement smartphone and that everything is working well for you.
Since you confirmed receipt and satisfaction with the replacement, we are closing your support case. Thank you for your cooperation.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey via email. Please share your feedback to help us improve our service.
